projects.name: Real-state Price prediction
projects.description: Architected a seamless and interactive user experience by integrating a Flask-based backend with Machine Learning algorithms and creating the Frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Various ML algorithms such as Logistic Regression, DecisionTreeRegressor, GridSearchCV to reduce error up to 80. Tools & technologies used: Python, Machine learning, Flask, Scikit-learn, HTML with model accuracy of 97%.

projects.name: Face mask detection model
projects.description: Implemented a real-time face mask detection model using computer vision techniques and deep learning algorithms, with the VGG16 prebuilt model, to enhance accuracy. Processed image data, trained neural networks, and integrated the model into video systems for real-time mask detection. Spearheaded the implementation of Python, Machine Learning, and CNN techniques to detect face masks with an accuracy of 92%.

projects.name: Fake news classification
projects.description: Developed a high-accuracy fake news classification model using advanced machine learning techniques. Implemented Python, NLP, and RandomForest classifier, which improved detection accuracy by 95% and reduced misinformation spread by 40%. This project involved preprocessing news classified data, training using machine learning, and achieving an accuracy of 98% on the test dataset. Tools & technologies used: Python, Scikit-learn, NLP.
